attributes.name: checked
attributes.title: Checked
attributes.description: Whether or not this checkbox is checked by default

attributes.name: name
attributes.title: Name
attributes.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

attributes.name: required
attributes.title: Required
attributes.description: Require the field to be completed prior to form submission

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the checkbox

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.title: Readonly
attributes.description: When true, the control will be immutable by user interaction

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The content of the checkbox represents its visual label

slots.name: indeterminate-indicator
slots.title: Indeterminate indicator slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the inditerminate state

slots.name: checked-indicator
slots.title: Checked indicator slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the checked state
